description: When Najica is sent on a rescue mission to a seemingly unprotected mansion, she is certain that it will be a quick and easy job. But when the maids employed by the lady of the house also turn out to double as a trigger-happy machine-gun squad, Najica realizes that she will need all of her skills and gadgets if she is to complete her mission and get out alive.

titles.title: A Magnificent Secret Agent with a Rose in her Hand
Die elegante Agentin trägt eine Rose
Karei Naru Agent wa Ichirin no Bara to Tomo ni
華麗なるエージェントは 一輪の薔薇と共に
